message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to acquire a truly unique product. Given its immense value and potential, I believe a starting price of $1,150,000 is fair. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only commit to a maximum of $1,050,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but my offer reflects the true value of this product.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,100,000. This is my final offer.
Alice, thank you for your offer. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $1,075,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
